Name: Fresh White Lady cocktail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
1.25 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE without ice and strain into chilled glass.
Review: Mastiha and peppermint bitters bring minty freshness to this riff on the classic White Lady .
History: Created by yours truly in August 2015 at the Cabinet Room in London, England. Inspired after making the same drink with white crème de menthe ( Minty White Lady ) and wondering how it would be with mastiha. White Lady cocktail history and recipe variations
Nutrition: One serving of Fresh White Lady cocktail contains 178 calories
